name: tm32
effect: Teaches Double Team to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Double Team to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.ruby-sapphire: Creates illusory copies to enhance elusiveness.
flavor_text.emerald: Creates illusory copies to enhance elusiveness.
flavor_text.firered-leafgreen: The user creates illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.
